channel.title: Dread 718: Custom Bosses & Minigames, Great Community, Enticing Home!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://dread-ps.com/images/logo.png[/img]
[url=http://dread-ps.com/landing]Home[/URL] - [url=http://dread-ps.com/forums]Community[/URL] - [url=http://dread-ps.com/voting]Vote[/URL] - [url=http://dread-ps.com/Dread718.jar]Play[/URL]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=grJ65P0xDuE#t=14[/youtube]
Welcome to Dread, where the players come first!
Here at Dread, our players mean a lot to us. This is why every update pushed out will be solely player suggestions or content our player base wants. We strive to be different than other servers, meaning we won't ignore player suggestions and push out content that you, the players, don't want. Also at Dread, we realize that not all players are into the same type of game play. This is why we make the server friendly to all. There is equal amount of content for all categories of players. So no matter what type of player you are, you will enjoy your experience! [/center]

item.title: Dread 718: Custom Bosses & Minigames, Great Community, Enticing Home!
item.dc:creator: @Wobblum Wobblum
item.description:
@Wobblum wrote:

Bump: new enticing home, 15+ active players, new donator zone, tons of donor benefits, gambler npc, new bosses and great community overral

Read full topic
